root.name: Blaster Master: Enemy Below
root.description: OverviewBlaster Master: Enemy Below is an action game developed and published by SunSoft for the Game Boy Color platform. Blaster Master: Enemy Below is a sequel in the Blaster Master series that started on the NES.The game was released on the 3DS Virtual Console in late 2011 and was only the second Game Boy Color game on the service (following The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX).
